children.text: Jennifer Schmerling is a Texas native who lives in Houston and loves walking her dog along their favorite flood mitigation structure, Buffalo Bayou.

mainImage.alt: Rep. Ann Johnson defeated incumbent Sarah Davis in November 2020 to represent Texas House District 134 in Houston.
mainImage.caption: Rep. Ann Johnson defeated incumbent Sarah Davis in November 2020 to represent Texas House District 134 in Houston.

node.title: 'There is nothing more important than air quality': A conversation with Rep. Ann Johnson

children.text: Newly elected to represent House District 134, Ann Johnson sees the 87th state legislative session as an opportunity to 'put some strength back into the regulations' that will protect Texans' health.

node.Action1Title: Learn more about one dirty power plant's contribution to poor air quality in Texas
